resources.string: #Go to your bKash Mobile Menu by dialing *247#->(1)\n\n #Choose “Payment”->(2)
#Enter the Merchant bKash Account Number you want to pay to->(3)\n\n #Enter the amount you want to pay->(4)
#Enter a reference* against your payment (you have to use your Reg No as reference)->(5)\n\n #Enter the Counter Number* (Counter No:1)->(6)
#Now enter your bKash Mobile Menu PIN to confirm->(7)\n\n #Payment successful->(8)
If you have completed your payment by following above rules then put your Transaction ID below

01. If user puts wrong information during signup or makes mistake then it will be inconsistant with the database and will produce wrong result 

02. If user makes a mistake during putting transaction ID's, then he/she may have to visit the office
 
03. Clerk can puts wrong payment information, in that case payment information will have be reseted
 
04. If you can not login, there is a chance the server is busy,try again a few minutes later
 
05. Please do not give your password to anyone else
